titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of October 17-23, 2021, as "National Chemistry Week".
Expressing support for the designation of the week of October 17-23, 2021, as "National Chemistry Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Chemistry Week.
The resolution also recognizes the need to promote the fields of science, including chemistry, technology, engineering, and mathematics, and to encourage youth, particularly from underrepresented groups, to pursue careers in these fields.
